name: Just press Space
description:
Just press space is well, a game about just pressing space, press that sucker until it won't press no more! and if anyone says anything about the game talking just ignore it there prob crazy or something haha, there is no talking text or any of the sorts in this game, Nope!

Anyways this is my first game that actually is a game and not just a movement script and a body lol, doesn't mean its great but im proud of it non the less! also would like to thank those who helped my dumbness out in the official unity discord.

Yes im aware that there are quite a few "Just press Space" games on itch and one that even looks similar, this is just a simple project that i came up with on my own with no inspiration from any other game and i have no intention of confusing people into getting my game instead of someone else's


welp i guess thats it, if you find any bugs (somehow) you can check the Readme file for how to report bugs and theres also important stuff like controls and such (yes there is more than 1 control)
